long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This free extension modifies your new tab page by adding:

1.1-Click access to popular email providers (Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo Mail & AOL) 
2. Shortcuts to top sites including Amazon, YouTube & Facebook.
3. Easy access to Yahoo Search via the search box.
4. Clock in the upper right hand corner.

It's free & lightweight, so try it today!
